categories: Category:The Official Star Wars Fact File

nodes.text: The Official Star Wars Fact File 1

The Official Star Wars Fact File 1 was the first issue of The Official Star Wars Fact File, released on December 27, 2001. The issue was authored by Darren Allanson, David Bailey, Chris Gardner and Iain Lowson. It also contained an original illustration by Carl Lyons.
The Dark Lords of the Sith article includes original artwork by Carl Lyons, depicting Exar Kun, Ulic Qel-Droma, Freedon Nadd and Naga Sadow.
